website_summaries.verdict: A fun design combines with quality fine mesh at an excellent price for 4 infusers.
pros: Users not only appreciate the cute design, but also praise the excellent size and ease of brewing
We love that they sit well in a cup and aren't difficult to clean
cons: Some felt the materials and construction could be a bit more durable

customer_reviews.title: If you drink tea, especially fine leafed tea...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these infusers because I was tired of the one I had leaking tea leaves into the cup. The fine mesh on this item is great and little to no leaves ever leak through (unless they are super fine, almost a powder). They look cute standing up in my cup and I also enjoy the little holder to place them in after use as it keeps the tea from leaking onto my counter and making a mess. It's easy to fill and clean out and with 4 different colors, I can use a different one while the previous one dries out (which makes it even easier to clean). I really would recommend this for tea lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Kel J

customer_reviews.title: Best Infuser Out There
customer_reviews.text: I'm really picky about my loose tea infusers. Call me a tea snob. I don't like loose floaties in my tea cup like I get with other infusers. The HOUSE AGAIN infusers are the best I've ever used - top quality. The microscopic mesh keeps tea (even tea dust) inside and let's water infuse easily. I like the individual size for a single cup of tea instead of having to use a larger pot size infuser. A great value to boot at this great price!
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Jan

customer_reviews.title: Work very well!
customer_reviews.text: I like to dry my own herbs & grind them for tea. These work great, they are super fine & don't let the tiny particles out into your teapot. I have used them for several batches & am happy with how well they work & they are easy to clean! They also hold a nice amount of ground tea, up to 5 or 6 teaspoons. The dried mix swells back up when soaked, but the lids have stayed on & I have had no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Coast Gal

customer_reviews.title: No Sediment After steeping Rooibos!
customer_reviews.text: Omg I'm in LOVE! I just brewed a cup of Rooibos tea with pretty much NO SEDIMENTS left behind. I'm super geeked! I hate the flower, would love something less girly BUT because of how awesome these work I'm willing to deal with it. They are easy to clean out and surprisingly the top(flowery part) sticks well enough to the cup that it doesn't come off while steeping tea.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Dunn

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This right here is the best tea infuser I have ever tried. I have tried a lot of different types of tea infusers, both the cute and practical type. No matter what though, I would always end up with tea leaves leaking out of the infuser. I have no idea why that bothers me so much, but hey I'm odd. The mesh on this infuser is so fine that nothing but water goes through. It's the perfect height for a standard mug. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leave much residue
customer_reviews.text: These work great for steeping loose tea! I researched a lot to find ones that wouldn’t leave much residue in the bottom of my cup, and these definitely don’t! You can’t help the tiny “sawdust” loose tea from seeping out a little bit, but this prevents that more than most I’ve tried. It also does not float. I can see the water bubble from the tiny holes at the top that are designed specifically for that. I just throw in the dishwasher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, but susceptible to staining.
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable and made for a perfect gift. They're easy to assemble and don't pop apart in the water like some pure silicone tea steppers tend to do. The fine mesh keeps everything inside, but be sure to tap out the leaves after brewing as they tend to stick and kind of sink in when dry. However, we throw them in the dishwasher on occasion which they both hold up to well. The only thing is that they will get stained by dark teas, it doesn't bother us, but we haven't found a way to remove the stains yet.
customer_reviews.author: LSequeira

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are great little tea infusers for those who enjoy loose leaf. I have purchased higher quality ones that had more color and detail and the stainless portion was smoother but I can't complain for the price. I did remove the flower heads and swap them onto different stems to make them a little more interesting. The mesh is super fine and you will get very few floaties in your tea. I've even used them with coffee though I recommend having one designated for this since the silicone will soak up the coffee smell.
customer_reviews.author: Shenweas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for bags =-)
customer_reviews.text: After news of tea bags dissolving and leaving plastic in hot teacups, I checked my cupboard. I had many of those bags left over and have been using them infrequently through the years. It takes awhile to use up a 100 bags that I get in one order. Sure enough, the bags were melting in my tea!!! You can't even notice it because the bags don't really fall apart or get a huge whole, it's like some dust dissolves from parts of the bag. Anyway, these infusers are a perfect replacement. After use I wash and dry the container, and leave it in my tea leaf container for next time. Sure beats drinking plastic!
customer_reviews.author: :o)

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite tea infusers
customer_reviews.text: I really hesitated to buy these because of how goofy I personally thought they looked. But I absolutely *love* them now. The angle of the flower is perfect for keeping the tea container in your cup. No tiny bits of tea escape the super fine mesh. Easy to clean. They fit everywhere. The little cups to sit the wet tea infuser into was especially thoughtful of the design. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Lafter The Fact

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for brewing single serving of Rasa
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago I started drinking Rasa, a coffee alternative. Although the brewing instructions say you can put it in a reusable K cup, they also say that it’s best to use a French press to get all the benefits out of the herbs and adaptogens. But it’s a pain to clean a French press. These are much faster! Love them! And I can let the grounds steep for as long as I want.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mertz

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, work well
customer_reviews.text: I've never made loose leaf tea before. I'm a coffee girl. But, needs must. I have to cut back on the caffeine, and have been looking for interesting hot drinks. These little whatsits are great. Easy to fill, easy to shake out and rinse. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have used these now for for 8 months. They are still awesome! I use them multiple times a day and they have held up beautifully! I still highly recommend them! I just got these today. I washed them immediately and started using them. It does a great job keeping the super small tea grounds in the container and out of your cup. It also seemed to infuse quicker since it is larger than my normal smaller tea mesh and it has tiny holes at the top to allow air to press out the top. I’m so glad I got these. It’s a great purchase and an awesome gift to a tea lover!
customer_reviews.author: User Reviews

customer_reviews.title: What a difference in the taste of tea!
customer_reviews.text: Got these yesterday and was excited to use them - although I had set my expectations pretty low. I have another tea infuser which I’ve used but was never really happy with. I put it down to the quality of the tea rather than the infuser. THEN I tried this infuser. Where have you been all my life?! Wowser. The tea’s true flavors came out in the first cup!!! I am beyond excited at how awesome this infuser is. Seriously, what a difference. Don’t hesitate - buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Vee G.

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for these!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best infusers I have found. NO tea particles end up in your tea!!! I have bought other ones and they never performed as they should. These have the CORRECT strainer/mesh to give you excellent tea to drink. Be sure you raise and hold it up for a minute when you lift it from your cup to make sure all the liquid comes out. Since the holes are smaller, it may take a few more seconds to make sure all the liquid drains into the cup. Excellent product, easy to rinse!
customer_reviews.author: Bumblebea

customer_reviews.title: Work well, tea leaves get stuck when cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Cute little tea infusers that have enough space for a larger pot of tea's worth of tea leaves. I was a bit worried at first that the silicone lid would pop out when lifting the wet infuser out, as it seemed a bit loose when putting it on, but I haven't had one spill yet. I like the little saucer, as I no longer have to get a dish dirty by setting my wet infuser on it.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack to split with my mom. We both agree that these are the best infusers that we have bought, and we have quite a few. My mom actually got rid of all her others when she got these, because they were so much better. The flowers are adorable and hold on to the edge of the cup, while still having the tea far down in the water. the metal piece has fine holes that keeps debris out of your cup, and is very easy to clean. I would buy another pack of these in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Finally, no escapees!
customer_reviews.text: These really do contain the tea leaves while also allowing the tea to steep properly. I love that the little flower top holds it on the side of the cup. There are two little holes in the top that let air in when steeping has finished and you're trying to let the excess liquid drain out. I really like the little plate that comes with it to set the wet container on while you enjoy your tea. Very pleased! No more hunting for the perfect tea infuser. I've found it! At least, it's perfect for me. :)
customer_reviews.author: OKshopper

customer_reviews.title: Best infusers ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are: very cute, perfectly sized, wash extremely well in the dishwasher. Of course, they hand wash well too I just sterilize everything before using. If you drink loose tea, these are THE best product ever- much nicer than those silly balls. Very easy to use. Just drop your tea in and drop into hot water (or pour hot water over it while in mug- dealer's choice). No mess when you take it out of the water. I love these and they are going on my holiday gift list for tea drinkers in my family!
customer_reviews.author: Jacsmoore

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR THOSE STUBBORN LOOSE TEAS
customer_reviews.text: Made it easy to use all my fine, loose leaf teas without the worry of too many leaves left in my cup. Bonus is everyone always compliments us on how cute they are and I lovvvveeee that they fit a good 2 tbsp of tea inside and clean perfectly in the dishwasher. Wish there were more cute designs so we could switch them out for holidays.
customer_reviews.author: James Kipfer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this diffuser every day. I like how it sits in the cup. I like the little saucer for when you’re ready to drink your tea. The very fine mesh of the diffuser makes it near impossible to clean. The tea gets stuck in the mesh. I do the best I can, and just know I’ve got some old tea stuck in there.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and work well. The only thing I don't like is you can't fill it up too much since the mesh is extremely fine as well the tea won't steep much. But as long as you only fill it aboit half way it does a great job and no particles get through the meshing. Very easy to clean with just a rinse.
customer_reviews.author: dl

customer_reviews.title: Good but bulky
customer_reviews.text: This product did what it was supposed to and worked great for my loose leaf tea. The only thing (I didn’t think of) is that the top with the leaf leaves less room in my mug for water. So instead of using my usual smaller mugs, I have to use my larger coffee mugs for a 10oz tea. Not a huge deal but something that I didn’t account for.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: SUPER AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! Not to mention super cute! A great value and easy to use! Even has cute drip cups!!!!!! They latch onto the side of every cup in my kitchen, with eaee. I will definitely order again and purchase as a gift. To clean all I have to do is rinse them! I feel like a little kid who just got that barbie dream house! 110 stars out of 10!!!!!! (Way better then the crapy ball ones that produce floaters)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't float, it looks cute, fits in starbucks mugs, and fits in small teapots
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first buy of a non-disposable, reusable solution for loose leaf tea! I had issues with lots of big leaf particles getting in the water, but with this I don't have that issue! It's very easy to clean and comes apart. The infuser sits well to the bottom of my mug, and it also fits inside my small tea pot. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sanddollars

customer_reviews.title: Favorite infuser so far
customer_reviews.text: I drink copious amounts of tea in the winter. I had owned a few of the "tea ball" cage things but found they were hard to clean and I ended up with a lot of loose leaf outside of the infuser. These are awesome so far! Only small, silty particles make it through the mesh! My only complaint is that they ARE kind of small (but they are still larger than the "tea balls"). I'm worried about the durability and wondering if the silicone flower will stretch out eventually. These are super cute and I love the little resting tray thing they come with!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Meagher

customer_reviews.title: These are a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets of these and they have been a hit with everyone who has used them - kids, family, co-workers. Great size, fun shape, and the holes are the smallest I have ever seen keep any size tea inside. I'm a guy and tend to use these the most at home (when nobody is looking). Highly recommend for yourself and give a few away.
customer_reviews.author: ScholDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific fit and finish!
customer_reviews.text: Love these infusers. I grow a lot of my own herbs and flowers and love to dry and make interesting tea mixtures. These infusers are perfect and the fine mesh does a good job of holding in most of the ground up matter. I also love the little “saucers” that each infuser has. The flower motif hangs perfectly off the edge of a cup as well. Bought these again for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: NadiaP

customer_reviews.title: Flawless Tea Infuser!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tea infuser! It holds all the loose tea very securely offering a delicious clean cup of tea! No loose particles floating around! See for yourself! Finally found an infuser that actually works! And four for the price of one , what a deal! Thank you House Again for making this!
customer_reviews.author: SmileTina

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have a hot tea addiction. This is a great enabler. The mesh is fine enough that none of my tea gets through, but not so fine that it clogs. The flower is cute, and I really like the cup at the bottom to catch any spills. The different colors are great too since they serve as markers for which cup belongs to which person.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.andMrs.MorenoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Like These Infusers
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for your money both in terms of quantity and quality with these infusers. I have only had them a couple of weeks, so I can't attest to their durability or whether they rust. (Some reviewers say that they rust and are not durable.) They seem very acceptably sturdy to me. One reviewer said that cleaning them with soap left a soapy taste, so I just rinse them out with hot water after each use. In short, I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Boutwell

customer_reviews.title: Better than the full silicone ones
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my sister. She loves tea and these were perfect. She loves them. Says they are better than the silicon ones because the holes aren’t as big compared to the silicone ones. Since it’s metal were the tea seeps the loose tea doesn’t get into the water. Plus they are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Rayane Alves

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and effective
customer_reviews.text: As someone who just recently discovered that loose leaf can refer to more than notebook paper, I definitely did a bit of stumbling and trial and error trying to figure out the tea world. Having purchased, tried, and returned several infusers I had all but lost hope until I stumbled upon these. Finally, I can make a nice cup of tea without drinking little pieces of leaves! I haven't had these long enough to speak to the durability, but out of the box, the performance has been fantastic! The design is also very cute! Worth the extra dollar over the leaf ones and the flowers are interchangeable!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!! Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little guys. Great quality and great value. I was hesitant cause they were so cheap, but I am thrilled I ordered. Other mesh balls leak tea leaves out and can rust and taste metallic after short use. I have had some rust after 2 days. The base of these are stainless still and the holes do not let anything out but flavor! I reccomend highly. I am keeping two and gifting other two with some cute cups and loose Tao of Tea tin!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cartee aka Raven

customer_reviews.title: Such a great find for a loose tea lover!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! What a great and unexpected find. So easy to fill, clean and they work great. Not to mention, how cute and fun are these interchangeable flower petals!! I was using the disposable tea filters before and these are so much easier to fill. The neck of the flower rests on the lip of your cup and it comes with an extra piece to rest the diffuser on when the tea is ready to drink. So perfect if you don’t want to wait around for it to steep. These would make a perfect gift for a fellow tea lover!
customer_reviews.author: Coconuttygrl83

customer_reviews.title: Durable, functional, and cute
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a tisane (tea made with non-leaf plant parts), and they're perfect. They're also really cute, and I love how you can hook them over the side of your tea mug. If you steep teas or tisanes that are a little powdery, some of it will filter through the mesh into your cup, but that's true when I use my muslin tea bags, too. I like how durable these are and how easy they are to clean. Definitely recommend these for tea lovers
customer_reviews.author: Stephie M

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for loose leaf tea
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something for my loose leaf tea that didn't require me to fill the mug up to the rim with water (some of the cute animal holders sat SO high on the cup, geez). This has been an amazing solution. Very easy to clean, very easy to use. The tiny coaster is nice too! I keep two at work and two at home for use and haven't had an issue with any. I noticed a few complaints about the flower part stretching out or coming off completely. I haven't had this issue since I set the rim of the cup right behind the nub holding the flower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tea Infuser for Fine Teas
customer_reviews.text: I have some tea from the UK that I've never seen leaves so fine before. None of my tea balls or infusers worked well...lots of tea at the bottom of my cup. So I found these infusers - just received today & used for the first time. They are wonderful! Super, super fine holes means no floating or settling tea leaves in my cup! I'm thrilled with them. They seem easy to clean & I like the little trays that come with them.
customer_reviews.author: MadAliceMe

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: No tea leaves in my tea anymore. These little cuties are actually are more functional than cute. They strain teas nicely and the coasters makes it easy to enjoy quickly without the worry of drippings. Comes with set of four so everyone in my family enjoys having their own. My sister and cousin also purchased sets after trying.
customer_reviews.author: A Knight

customer_reviews.title: Okay product but could be made better
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with these infusers overall. While the price was good for a four pack, I did find that it's hard to get the lid to fit into the actual strainer. It's also hard to get the tea out once you steep the leaves and they dry. I will probably try another brand to see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ang Henderson

customer_reviews.title: The Prefect Tea Infuser!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pack of tea infusers because I was tired of having to use a entire infusing pot for just a single cup of tea. These infusers are made from soft silicone and have a sturdy fine mesh basket that can easily hold approximately 2oz of dried tea leaves. The come in four colors and are easy to clean. Perfect for taking on the go to the workplace. The small silicone drip catch tray is a plus so your infuser can sit once removed from your cup and not drip a mess all over the counter. A great gift for any tea lover that wants “just one cup”. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Shafer

customer_reviews.title: So practical and so cute
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I was using a tea ball and lots of leaves were escaping into my tea. These strainers are much more sturdy and have tiny holes so that can't happen. The tops seal well and the little flowers hang on all my different sized tea mugs without a problem. I love the bright colors and cuteness factor. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: suzieqmo

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you love loose leaf teas!
customer_reviews.text: Great infusers! Love the set. I went on a loose tea shopping spree and these really came in handy. Plus they're so cute. It was nice being able to share my recent tea discoveries with others because the set had 4 infusers so we weren't dealing with fighting over my one tea ball infuser or loose leaves floating in our tea. Also a fan of the little drip tray they come with. Didn't realize how nice that feature was until I had these.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina K

customer_reviews.title: Cute tea strainers!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for me and my roommates and they are a hit! The finer mesh is great for teas with a lot of fine particles. After a few months of use, some of the ones we use more often are a little tea-stained, but that may just be because we aren't cleaning them as much as we should. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these tea infusers. It works like a charm. I make loose leaf green tea and chamomile flowers loose leaf tea and this infuser works perfectly for both. Nothing in my tea cup except great tea. It is so cute that I leave one on my kitchen counter all the time. It makes me smile when I go in my kitchen and see the pretty Daisy. Plan to buy more for little Christmas gifts for my tea loving friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mariette

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Practical!!
customer_reviews.text: These tea strainers are not only adorable, they work great, too!! Made of super fine metal mesh material and silicone, they seal tightly and no tea leaf residue seeps through!! Clean quickly by simply rinsing under hot water. Great little product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These tea infusers are much better than the tea ball I was using.
customer_reviews.text: They steep the tea allowing only tiny amounts of tea debris (doesn't bother me at all) to get into the water. The tops stay suctioned on and the whole unit is easy to clean. There is enough room to put a spoon in and squeeze out as much tea as possible. I have used these with small leaf teas.
customer_reviews.author: Lana's Turn

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: We were gifted loose tea and needed something we could use to brew a cup of tea. These allow us to put in the tea leaves and dip the leaves into the water to brew a single cup of tea. The little holder holds the top part and catches any liquid escaping the holder; avoiding making a mess on the counter/table.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Cute alternative to disposable tea bags
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. The mesh is fine enough that you never get loose tea floating in your drink, but it allows the flavor to flow through perfectly. Fairly easy to clean, just pop it apart/rinse the tea out and put all the pieces in the dishwasher basket. I bought these for myself but would make a nice gift or party favor.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We drink tea a LOT in my home! These are perfect for making a pot to turn into iced tea for the day, and are exactly what I was looking for for the teas that can be steeped multiple times. I can steep once, then set it on it’s very own little coaster till I’m ready to steep a second time. They were also bigger than I had been anticipating which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Japanese green tea
customer_reviews.text: My loose leaf green tea can get a bit powdery. The other infusers I have can leave a lot of sediment. There's almost none when using these. It's a neat design that makes it easy to brew a cup even with the finest loose leaf tea. Easy to clean if you don't let it sit too long before you do. 4 of these for the price I paid is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: SeanTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. The best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few different kinds of strainers all at once and these are so far the best ones. The silicon is soft, colorful and pleasant. The mesh is fine and therefore filters well. Easy to open/close/clean. It has tiny holes in the top to expell the excess air (without adding tea floatties) so the unit doesnt float awkwardly. The flower stem bends to hook onto the cup lip. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: The Sullivans

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and very functional
customer_reviews.text: Great tea infusers; the mesh is very fine, I never have any issues with tea particles floating out. They're large so you can easily customize how much tea is in each one and added bonus, they're super cute! Very easy to use, the little drip trays are convenient and I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Works with coffee!
customer_reviews.text: After going through 3 Kuerigs in 2 years when the pumps went out, I'd had enough. Figuring a Keurig filter wasn't much different than a tea filter, I ordered these hoping they'd work with coffee. I wasn't disappointed! Just fill with coffee, drop in a cup filled with water from my tea kettle, and I have my cup of coffee in minutes! Easy to fill, easy to clean, and much less effort of a brewer! I love them, and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kudos! Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! My son's gf gave me tea imported from China. They are not leaves, but little pods. They fit perfectly in little canister, easy to close and the tea came out perfect!. The tea was surprisingly black in color, but very smooth and clear. The flower tops are cute, but I think I might like something more geometric in design. Love this product and use it daily!! Easy to clean. Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected! I use for cold brew—beats cleaning French press.  Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My French press carafe that I used for steeping coffee ground broke, so I bought these. If you need/want to avoid caffeine and acid, or just like iced coffee, you may like these as much as I do! I steep coffee grounds in unheated water overnight in a jar in the fridge. My morning coffee is easy to heat up in microwave or just drink iced. I use in hot water for tea leaves also. Easy to use and clean. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bubbasuzy

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Delight
customer_reviews.text: This product is so fantastic. We have used it just a few times, but, are delighted with how nicely it helps in the tea infusion and all the tea leaves are contained well within. Easy to clean. Comes with a silicone grip and hold and a base to ensure that kitchen surface stays clean. Loved it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh NG

customer_reviews.title: Best "Cute" Infuser
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaaaaaay better than all the other "cute" tea infusers. The mesh is fine enough to stop everything but the thinnest of rooibos sprigs from getting through, and even then only a couple make it out. It also lets water flow through better than I expected, making for a complete infusion without the need for stimulation or additional time like some of the less permeable products out there. Lastly, the hopper is large enough to steep enough Chinese oolong to fill a 12oz mug. And you get 4 of them for $8!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: After finding out how much plastic I was ingesting from teabags I decided to switch over to loose tea. Unfortunately the holes in my tea ball where large and I ended up with debris in every cup. I bought these after reading an article on the top tea infusers. I am thrilled with these. They stay together well even during stirring, no tea leaves leaked out, they're easy to clean and they're adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie N

customer_reviews.title: Love the Tea holder.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Easy to fill up with your loose tea mix. The longer you keep the holder in hot water the stronger the tea. Can wash independently or put in dish washer. The silicone top did not shrink in the dishwasher. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Diffuser Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are delightful tea infusers that work better than any tea diffuser I have ever owned! The mesh is so fine that nothing escapes but the full tea flavor. I love these! They look pretty darn cute, too! And I appreciate the little silicone “tray” to set the diffuser on when the steeping is done. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Stewart-Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful update for a tea infuser.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these tea infuser. I had a metal one that you had to squeeze open to put the tea in and with arthritis in my hands is was getting more and more difficult. These are so easy to use, and the mesh if really fine, so nothing gets out into your tea. And I love the little tray - I can take my cup of brewing tea, sit down with my book, and at the right time, life the infuser out and place it on the tray. I just think they're great. And because they came with four, I have already shared one with a friend!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make Thyme tea for my muscle and joint issues.. the infuser I had before let bits of the thyme leaves escape into the cup, but these are great, So much easier to use that what I had and now no more fishing stray bits out of my cup.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bedwell

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love that this has it's own little tray to put the strainer in when you have taken it out of the water. I always put too much tea in and so I can use it two or three times and not having it on the sink, counter, or desk is ideal (plus it contains the little bit of water that stays in the leaves and slowly seeps out). Easy to use, cute, very happy with the way the work.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Ceranic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These tea strainers are perfect! I use one every day for tea and gave the others as gifts. The holes are so small I don't get any leaves floating through, yet big enough to let water in for steeping. I also like that there's a tiny hold in the top silicone that allows air to come out easily and the steeper to sink lower in the water. These are superior do the the other style with the rounded base and larger holes. If you don't need as many steepers, definitely get these!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Tea Infusers
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic!! I love that they are easy to use, easy to clean, and portable for travel!! The bottom of the flower is perfect as a spoon rest. I would definitely buy them again, and they would make great gifts for a tea lover.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Leak free, easy to fill, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! They don’t leak, easy to clean and are super cute! I love the little saucer also. I think one of the best aspects is they are easy to fill without any mess. These would make a great gift the box is pretty and sturdy. Super fast delivery also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little things! They are just right in every way! The mesh is small so even the smallest bits of tea don't escape into your cup, the flower hooks cutely on the side of your cup to hold it stationary, and the tiny tray is perfect to put it on when it's done steeping waiting for your next cup. I would order these again and again. Better than any tea ball or strainer I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: dbest57

customer_reviews.title: Finally, no debris!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. The cute animal-shaped infusers that I’ve been gifted over the years have served me well, but they always leave loose leaf debris in my tea. The mesh is so fine in these infusers that I no longer have that issue. These also sit pretty in my tea nook. I’ll probably gift them to one of the many tea lovers in my family at some point.
customer_reviews.author: stringsonthings

customer_reviews.title: Great loose leaf tea filter
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a great cup of loose leaf tea. It is easy to use but the rubber gets stained easily after a few uses. It is easy to clean unless you let dry the leads inside. Then you will need to put it back in water before washing it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha E Right

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. So much so that I bought a second set for my sister. The only reason for the 4 is because they have rusted a little. I don't know why because I haven't put them in the dishwasher and I don't think it's tea stain, but other than that slight discoloration they are cute, hang on the side of your cup and hold quite a bit of tea leaves for as strong a cup of tea as you like.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: They are cute! what more can you say?
customer_reviews.text: So, let's start with obvious! These are SUPER CUTE! I am the envy of tea makers at work. I catch people looking at my little cup if happiness! I could gift these, to someone, but if I didn't have a set for myself, I would more than likely, gift them to me! They are really awesome, easy to clean and a conversation piece! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Deryn's Doings

customer_reviews.title: Cute as can be and works
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these loose tea strainers. I have some very fine black tea that would inevitably slip through the larger holes of my tea ball and into my cup. I have very little to no residue from these. Also they are simply adorable and would be great for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Whimsical, yet practical
customer_reviews.text: These tea infusers are so much fun to use and work perfectly. I’ve never been a tea drinker, but a friend told me about a tea-based latte called London Fog. It requires Lavender Earl Grey tea. I wanted to try loose leaf tea and this mesh infuser keeps the tea where you want it, in the infuser. I love it! I kept two and gifted two to a relative.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: The base is too small to hold the draining tea
customer_reviews.text: After you pull it out of your teacup, make sure to hold it and let it drain over the teacup for a while because the base where it is supposed to rest to catch the draining water is too small to hold much. Otherwise it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Counts

customer_reviews.title: Totally Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Its not my favorite design or look but the #1 reason to recommend, is there is little to no sediment or loose leaf particles in my cup of tea!! That is everything to me. I also like that the flower bends enough to hold onto the rim of the mug so you dont have to fish it out. And I like the little "dish" to rest the infuser on. Just overall easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: They work well, they don't keep EVERY little bit of sediment out of course, but they work better than the ball ones i used before. Only thing is they float up to the top of the tea bc they have air in them (they do eventually settle back down so it's no problem) but when you take them out when the teas done steeping water gets trapped inside so you might have to hold it at an angle for the water to escape and tap it a bit, but that's just a minor step u might want to do but it's not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These little flowers are even better than I expected! They are very easy to fill without making a mess and to clean after use. They allow the tea leaves to expand without slipping through the mesh. I love the bottom tray to put the infuser in after using as to not to make a mess. The height of the flower allows you to safely and easily remove the infuser without touching the hot water. I was between a few options, I am very glad I chose these! To top it off, they are adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Craig T.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried for years to develop a taste for tea, and when a was gifted with some Chinese loose tea, I found these on Amazon. They work perfectly, and are stylish besides. I only needed one, so I gifted the rest. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Klingman

customer_reviews.title: Received used instead of new.
customer_reviews.text: Got order and it was used in stead of being new like listed! There was still tea stuck on the metal portion. There were also tea lines on the metal. Extremely disappointed with this!
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Works great and will hold even very fine teas
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these type tea pods for years and I lost the metal part somehow on accident so I thought I would try these, they are great! Price is very good, the pods work fine and have no taste or plastic smell to them. I like that the flower hangs to the glass rim my old pod did not do that and would fall deep into a tall mug. I would buy more of these if I have any more strange disappearances
customer_reviews.author: Juja Z.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! Exactly what I needed for my loose leaf tea. Lots of space which allows for teas with larger pieces or if I want to make a stronger brew. The pack of four will last forever or make an excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The bee's knees of infusers!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for ages for some tea infusers that have small enough holes in them that tea leaves won't slip through and get into my drink, but that are also easy to clean! Now, I can finally say that I don't have to search any longer. These are great in every way, and you can't beat the price for a pack of 4!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I scoured through and read reviews for soooooo many infuses, this one does the perfect job where others seem to fall shirt. They have very fine mesh perfect for loose leaf, and the silicone top STAYS where it SHOULD! No slipping off when you touch it or spillage! No sediment in my cup! I made nut almond cream loose leaf last night, it was perfect and very flavorful. Highly recommend you get these if you're on the fence
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Qualls

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It was an awesome value for the price. I love that I can brew loose leaf tea without having to brew an entire pot. The mesh on the infuser is very fine which allows you to brew even the finest loose leaf tea without leaving dregs in your cup. The silicon flower creates a tight seal and holds the infuser in place. The entire thing is very easy to clean. We used these over the holiday weekend and they were a huge hit with our guests!
customer_reviews.author: skier11

customer_reviews.title: JUST GIVE THEM YOUR MONEY LOL
customer_reviews.text: Okay these are easily the best thing I have ever drank my tea with!! I was using a French press and as you can imagine, is a pain to clean! but these you can literally just rinse out! And it doesn’t add anymore dishes! It’s so cute and convenient and they work incredible! There’s very little sediment in the bottom of my cup! Compared to how much I would get with my FP. I highly recommend these! For less than $20 for 4 of these? Just give them your money! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Oh, how wonderful these are!!! Before, I'd use an old style infuser and would end up with about 1/8 teaspoon of tea particles floating in the water. With these, nothing escapes no matter how small your tea leaves are. It gives me a new joy in drinking lose leaf tea.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Ruth Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Best Infuser Out There!!
customer_reviews.text: I swear, these are seriously my favorite things ever right now! The packaging was great, the small "plate" at the bottom is very useful, the top to close the strainer is so cute and really durable, the mesh for the strainer is extra fine, no leaks of loose tea at all. The size of it is more than enough for a mug. I actually filled less than half of half the size of the infuser. Im not much of a tea drinker, but I will be now!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Just like all the reviews say, wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These work really well and never accidently open like tea balls. Just like all the other reviews say, these work really well, and they're pretty to boost. I even put them in my insulated metal sip bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Love These!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price for four!! I don’t really need four so have some to my tea drinking friends. I got these to replace my ball infuser because it was always leaking tea leaves out of it when submerged. The seal is perfect, they never leak and the little stand allows you to cradle it and let the leaves dry if you plan to use them a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie0804

customer_reviews.title: Adorable tea infuser set!
customer_reviews.text: These tea infusers work great -- very easy to clean and easy to use. They also look adorable and I like the variety of colors. For super fine teas, a few grains may still come out, but overall, everything stays contained. Very please and would highly recommend to others, especially because the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Mima

customer_reviews.title: What’s the Tea on these infusers?!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Recently joined a monthly tea subscription with different teas each day... didn’t realize till day 1 that these were loose teas and not pre-bagged. With these cute flowers, I can faithfully enjoy my tea without having to strain out my cup after steeping! Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Heather P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice For Making Loose Leaf Tea
customer_reviews.text: These work really well and are very durable. The mesh if very fine with makes it a little difficult to clean. More than once I've missed a few leaves and had to soak and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Monty

customer_reviews.title: Functional, cute, great value
customer_reviews.text: Very cute canister style infuser that has not leaked any leaves as of yet. You remove the petal to load in the leaves. It comes off easily, so I was worried that it would come off too easily while hanging on the edge of a cup. Nope! No issues like that. The infuser sits in the bottom silicone piece, so there is no pull when you lift.
customer_reviews.author: R. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to use - love how can easily take flower off, add tea, put flower back on and use. Tray is great to set on and save the tea in the refrigerator for next use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to hot teas and hot herbal teas. This set is lovely and works well. The packaging is nice and would make a cute gift idea too. I have arthritis in my fingers/thumbs, but I had no trouble handling the pieces in this set. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Randleas

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and easy to use. I use them to make lavender and chamomile tea. They stay closed while using but are easy to open when cleaning. I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Cute Tea Infuser
customer_reviews.text: I got this pack for myself as well as for a coworker. The diffuser at the bottom of the leaf is easy to clean and I’ve gotten so many compliments from people that I work with. The little dish to set it aside in when you’re done is cute, but sometimes fills up pretty quickly if the tea leaves are very saturated, so just be mindful of that when using.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Quesenberry

customer_reviews.title: awesome little steeper!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these based on previous reviews, the cuteness of them, & the quantity I received. I had minor leakage, but not enough to complain. The strain worked really well otherwise and I was able to get a good steep. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Picture Not Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Giftable
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and very practical! The entire thing is separable. You can remove the petals and the top which would make cleaning extremely easy. They even come with a little tray to hold the strainer which is so very practical in my opinion. It comes with 4 in very bright colors. This would be a great gift paired with some loose leaf teas.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

product_meta.title: House Again 4-pack Extra Fine Mesh Tea Infuser with Drip Tray - 18/8 Stainless Steel Fine Mesh Tea Cup with BPA-Free Silicone Lid - Perfect Tea Balls Tea Strainers
feature_bullets: MORE PRACTICAL: Designed to be practical not just beautiful or attractive. Truly fine mesh helps you to filter all types of tea, including super fine tea that get through other tea balls or tea diffusers.
BETTER TASTE AND FASTER: More holes & won’t float. Tea leaves will expand and bloom fully in the water. You can get a better flavor faster every time.

EASY TO USE: Unique HANGING DESIGN makes it possible to hang on cups & mugs of different sizes. Simply fill tea, twist to close, steep with hot water and then get a cup of fresh full flavored tea. Perfect for working or travelling.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: BPA-free Silicone handle and high-grade stainless steel mesh tea cup are made to guarantee your healthy life.
The HOUSE AGAIN Advantage: Professional tea infuser manufacturer. Multiple high-quality products for your choice. Worry-free 30-DAY and 24/7 friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,449 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
